Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First lets break down the steps from the description Steps 1 Receive application resume and questionnaire 2 Resume parsing and initial data check with a loop for missing information 3 Preliminary skill assessment with threshold 4 Cultural fit and community affiliation check with potential bias 5 Managerial review and final decision

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We are to model two versions Model 1 with potential unfairness After the skill assessment there is an XOR branching One branch leads to a standard cultural fit evaluation and the other to a CommunityAffiliationCheck activity Model 2 without unfairness all applicants undergo the same cultural fit evaluation process no XOR branch providing selective advantages

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Lets define the activities ReceiveApplication DataCompletenessCheck RequestMoreInfo SkillAssessment StandardCulturalFitCheck CommunityAffiliationCheck ManagerialReview FinalDecision

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Loop for data completeness The loop has two parts A DataCompletenessCheck B RequestMoreInfo The loop is LOOP A B execute A then either exit or execute B and then A again

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: After SkillAssessment an XOR for skill result X1 XOR fail silent pass branch For unfair model pass branch has X2 XOR StandardCulturalFitCheck CommunityAffiliationCheck then both lead to ManagerialReview FinalDecision This XOR branch introduces potential unfairness

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Build unfair model RA then loop then SA then X1 X1 children fail silent and pass branch pass branch StrictPartialOrder X2 MR FD order X2 to MR MR to FD X2 XOR SCFC CAC root StrictPartialOrder RA loop SA X1 with edges RA to loop loop to SA SA to X1

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Fair model similar but pass branch StrictPartialOrder SCFC MR FD order SCFC to MR MR to FD no X2 X1 fair XOR fail silent fair pass branch root fair same structure with X1 fair

Name: Validation - PE
Text: This model represents Start with ReceiveApplication then loop data completeness then SkillAssessment then XOR skill result If fail silent end If pass partial order XOR cultural fit either standard or community then ManagerialReview then FinalDecision This matches the unfair model
